So is this version clean or not? someone just posted there's a trojan in it.
It's clean. All trojans people post on bigtime torrents like this as just false positives. They have been for years. If you see EVERYONE complaining about a virus, then that's when you worry.

Downloaded & Installed! 

Install Time is about 25 min on Core i3.

Working Fine :)

@icero93

It's not as complicated as you might think, go into the game, graphics options (little TV icon), then change your resolution there to w/e you want. Mine also came distorted, until I changed it. Also the controls are not found in the main menu settings. Instead you need to be in game and then press "O", that will bring your inventory up, that has your skills, and keys used to perform different actions. Anyways GL and have fun!

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7
Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor or AMD equivalent
Memory: 2GB
Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 512 MB Video Card or AMD equivalent
DirectX®:
Hard Drive: 20 GB space free (10 GB free after install)
